step2.ptxt: The wireless door lock control system is a convenient system for locking and unlocking all the doors from a distance.
A key-integrated, 2-button type*1 or 3-button type*2 transmitter is used.
In this system, the door control receiver performs the code identification process and the No. 1 integration relay performs door lock control.
When preparing a new transmitter to replace one that has been lost, it is necessary to register the recognition code. For details, refer to the corresponding Service Bulletin for this model.
